snippet: The patient’s parents traveled from Guinea to Mali seeking medical care. An emergency vaccination drive is being organized to forestall an outbreak.
abstract: World Health Organization readies emergency vaccination effort in Bamako, Mali, after vaccine-derived case of polio is confirmed to have paralyzed child.
lead_paragraph: The patient’s parents traveled from Guinea to Mali seeking medical care. An emergency vaccination drive is being organized to forestall an outbreak.

headline.main: West African Child Is Paralyzed by Vaccine-Derived Polio
headline.print_headline: Polio Case in Mali Prompts Vaccination Drive
